meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ultimate.
meanings.sent1: The ultimacy of his decision was evident in his unwavering determination.
meanings.sent2: The team reached the ultimacy of their success when they won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The ultimacy of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him reached the ultimacy of a fairytale romance.
meanings.sent5: The ultimacy of the storm left a lasting impression on the town.

meanings.definition: The final or most extreme point or part.
meanings.sent1: At the ultimacy of the movie, the unexpected plot twist shocked everyone.
meanings.sent2: The ultimacy of the mountain was a challenging peak to conquer.
meanings.sent3: The ultimacy of the dessert was a giant sundae with all the toppings.
meanings.sent4: The ultimacy of her anger was like a volcano about to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The ultimacy of the race was the finish line just ahead.
